scripts.build: bun build src/new-worktree.ts --outfile dist/new-worktree --target bun && bun build src/cleanup-worktree.ts --outfile dist/cleanup-worktree --target bun
scripts.postbuild: echo '#!/usr/bin/env bun' | cat - dist/new-worktree > dist/new-worktree.tmp && mv dist/new-worktree.tmp dist/new-worktree && echo '#!/usr/bin/env bun' | cat - dist/cleanup-worktree > dist/cleanup-worktree.tmp && mv dist/cleanup-worktree.tmp dist/cleanup-worktree && chmod +x dist/*
